title: Delphi MT05.3 ecu
content:
Hi I have a Honda IGX800 V twin engine with a Delphi MT05.3 ecu The engine has an idle of 1400 rpm
I would like to be able to gain access to the ecu and reduce the idle rpm to around 950 /1000 rpm
What would I need to access the ecu? and is there anyone who could help with reducing the idle rpm?
Any help suggestions ideas really would be appreciated thanks

comments.text: This software claims that it can edit the calibration for your ECU
What controller are you using? Controls Inc?
I am not sure its just a Delphi MT05.3 ecu on a Honda IGX800 v twin Industrial engine
